about_the_game:
Dive into the authentic and expansive world of the Middle Ages in 'Medieval Life,' an open-world RPG meticulously designed by Wasted Potential Studios. In this game, history and fantasy converge to offer an experience that is both realistic and captivating. Players assume the role of a character navigating the complexities and wonders of medieval society, where choices have lasting consequences, and every path leads to a unique destiny.

Play Modes


Single-Player: Offline Mode
Non-Dedicated Servers (Local Host) up to 70 Players.

Dedicated Server Hosting with up to 70 concurrent players.

Official Servers – Which will hold community events, Special Events. As well as provide a place to play and call home.

Immersive Storytelling


Embark on a Journey of Choice and Consequence

In ‘Medieval Life’, every dialogue and decision weave the fabric of your unique story. Our immersive storytelling matrix is designed to place you at the heart of the narrative, where your words and actions resonate with the world around you. Engage in dynamic conversations that shape your path, aligning you with the factions and characters that will determine your place in history.

With a triad of responses available in every interaction—friendly, neutral, or hostile—you have the power to influence relationships, forge alliances, or ignite rivalries. Our nuanced system ensures that your journey is uniquely your own, allowing you to delve into the political depth of the realm as much or as little as you desire.

Each choice carries weight, granting you the freedom to create a legacy in a living, breathing world that responds to your actions. Whether it’s through gaining favor or causing disdain, your story will unfold across a tapestry of cinematic outcomes and verbal exchanges, leading to a multitude of potential endings.

Prepare to engage in a dialogue system where every conversation can lead to one of 27 different outcomes, each branching path a reflection of your personal play style and decisions. Your adventure awaits—how will you shape the world of ‘Medieval Life’?

Highly Detailed Characters


In ‘Medieval Life’, you’ll be enveloped in a world where characters transcend the boundary between digital and reality. Our characters are sculpted with unparalleled detail, utilizing Epic’s MetaHuman system—an advanced toolset that constructs astonishingly realistic human models. This pioneering technology enables us to create characters with nuanced facial expressions and refined physical movements, capturing the full spectrum of human emotion and subtlety.

Every interaction is brought to life using full-body and facial motion capture, ensuring that each gesture, each flicker of expression, is as authentic as it is in the real world. These high-fidelity avatars respond with a lifelike presence, reacting to your actions and decisions in a way that feels truly impactful.

As you venture through ‘Medieval Life’, you will not just see but feel the emotions of every character, from the weariness of a battle-hardened knight to the sly grin of a street-savvy rogue. Our commitment to emotional resonance and visual fidelity means that characters’ eyes glisten with depth and stories, their faces wrinkle in sorrow or joy, and their postures shift with intent.

This level of detail extends beyond the individual, breathing life into the entire cast of characters that populate the dynamic world of ‘Medieval Life’. Engage in a gaming experience where every character you meet is as close to real as possible, each with their own identity, shaped by the technology that blurs the line between player and persona.

Dynamic Combat


‘Dynamic Combat’ in ‘Medieval Life’ is not just about clashing swords; it’s about mastering a complex art of war where strategy is king and every decision can turn the tide of battle. Our combat system invites you to immerse yourself in the intricacies of medieval warfare, where each weapon from the expansive arsenal at your disposal has its unique advantages and tactical uses, as depicted in our detailed weapon diagrams.

Wield the mighty trebuchet to lay siege to enemy fortifications, or defend your stronghold with ballista towers and cunningly placed mangonels. Engage in visceral close-quarters combat with a variety of swords and polearms, each with its own handling and strike patterns. Choose the right bow from the longbow to the composite bow for precision strikes from a distance, or opt for the brute force of a heavy crossbow to penetrate the thickest armor.

In ‘Medieval Life’, battles are not solitary affairs; they are massive multi-player events where coordination with your fellow combatants is essential. Form battalions to execute complex maneuvers that reflect real-world medieval tactics. Siege warfare is elevated to a grand scale, requiring collective effort and sharp leadership to breach enemy walls or repel attackers with a well-timed counter-siege.

Our commitment to creating a truly dynamic combat experience means that every skirmish, battle, and siege is a living puzzle. You must adapt to the ever-changing flow of combat, utilize the environment, and leverage the diverse weaponry available to claim victory. Whether it’s a multiplayer battle vying for control of strategic locations or a protracted siege that tests the limits of your resilience and resourcefulness, ‘Medieval Life’ offers a combat experience that is as deep and strategic as it is thrilling and action-packed.

Expansive World


Embark on a journey through the Expansive World of ‘Medieval Life’, where the rolling green hills, rugged coastlines, and mystic woodlands of a meticulously crafted medieval Ireland await you. Our world is not just vast in scale; it’s teeming with life and history. Each valley and village, castle, and crossroad has been designed with an eye for historical authenticity and an intent to immerse you in the richness of the era.

Venture beyond the safety of castle walls to traverse a landscape brimming with wonders and perils. From the smallest hamlet to the grandest fortress, every stone is steeped in lore, every path a chance for new adventures. Discover hidden groves sacred to druids, cross swords with bandits on ancient Roman roads, and trade tales with travelers in bustling market towns.

Our expansive world is dynamically alive, evolving with the stories of its inhabitants. Engage with characters whose lives are as intricate as the tapestry of history they inhabit. Participate in seasonal festivals, witness the consequences of political strife, and leave your mark on the world as it unfolds around you.

In ‘Medieval Life’, exploration goes beyond the physical journey—it’s about discovering the interconnected stories that make up the medieval tapestry. Unearth long-lost secrets, solve age-old mysteries, and claim lands to expand your influence. In this realm, every corner of the map promises not just discovery but the opportunity to forge your destiny in the annals of medieval Ireland.

Player Choices & Consequences: Shape Your Legacy

In the realm of ‘Medieval Life’, every choice you make carves a path through the annals of history, with consequences that resonate throughout your journey and beyond. This world is your canvas, and the brushstrokes of your decisions will determine the legacy you leave behind, both as an individual and as the leader of your custom-created Faction.

Forge Your Faction's Future


Begin as a small gathering of loyal followers and evolve into a mighty Faction, establishing your claim and constructing a kingdom that reflects your strategic acumen and diplomatic prowess. As you progress, you’ll manage vassals, secure tributaries, and even recruit NPCs to populate your lands. These subjects will toil on your behalf, automating tasks and contributing to your domain’s prosperity. However, governance is a mantle worn lightly by those who respect their people. Treat your NPCs with care and fairness, for their loyalty hinges on your leadership. Neglect or mistreat them, and you may face rebellion within your own borders.

Diplomacy and Warfare: A Delicate Balance

Expand your influence through shrewd diplomacy and strategic warfare. You can vassalize neighboring NPC villages, drawing them into your fold, or engage in conquest to bring smaller kingdoms under your banner. But be wary, for the world of ‘Medieval Life’ is a tapestry of alliances and enmities, where every interaction has a ripple effect. Aligning with one faction might sour relations with another, as alliances and hostilities shape the geopolitical landscape.

Complex Relationships: The Politics of Power

Your Faction’s reputation is a currency spent wisely or squandered foolishly. Foster friendly relations to build alliances that support your kingdom’s growth and prosperity. Remain neutral to avoid the pitfalls of political entanglement, or assert your might as a hostile force to be reckoned with. But remember, the art of statecraft is nuanced; today’s enemy could be tomorrow’s ally, and vice versa.

In ‘Medieval Life’, the narrative is not scripted by destiny; it’s crafted by your hands. Every decision contributes to the story of your Faction and its place in the world. From the rise of your kingdom to the intricate web of your political relations, your choices carve out a story of triumph, treachery, and transformation.

Your Story, Your World

The ‘Player Choices & Consequences’ mechanics in ‘Medieval Life’ offer an unparalleled depth of strategy and personalization, allowing you to weave a story that is uniquely yours. Will you be a benevolent ruler or a tyrant feared by all? Will your kingdom stand the test of time, or will it be a footnote in the chronicles of greater empires? The fate of your land, your people, and your legacy lies in your hands.
Or Will you choose the life of a simple farmer, fisher, blacksmith, or maybe an entertainer!

Skill Mastery & Personal Growth

Develop your character’s skills through a system that rewards practice and proficiency. Whether you’re honing the sharp edge of your swordsmanship, mastering the delicate art of diplomacy, or perfecting your trade skills, progression in ‘Medieval Life’ feels organic and impactful. Your character’s abilities reflect your play style, allowing you to specialize in a way that feels personal and rewarding.

Customization: The Art of Identity


Character development is deeply customizable, giving you control over not just the physical appearance but also the cultural background, personal history, and moral compass of your avatar. Epic’s MetaHuman system is at the heart of this, providing lifelike avatars that serve as your vessel in this medieval world. From the color of your character’s eyes to the timbre of their voice, the customization options are vast and varied, enabling you to craft a truly unique persona.

Intelligent NPC Behavior


NPCs in ‘Medieval Life’ are endowed with complex behavior patterns. They are not mere bystanders; they are active participants in the world. Farmers till the fields, blacksmiths forge weapons, and monarchs strategize over territorial conquests. These characters eat, sleep, interact, and respond to the environment and the player’s actions with a sense of purpose and realism.
Our Advanced AI extends to the broader mechanics of the game, influencing economic systems, faction politics, and environmental responses. The market prices fluctuate with supply and demand, factions muster forces and forge alliances based on political landscapes, and wildlife roams the wilderness following migratory patterns or the lure of prey.
In the heat of battle, enemies and allies alike showcase tactical intelligence, adapting to your combat style. Opponents will learn from and react to your strategies, requiring you to continually evolve your approach. Commanders lead their troops with strategic intent, and creatures use their natural abilities to their advantage, creating a challenging and varied combat experience.
Each NPC remembers their interactions with you, shaping their future behavior and dialogue. Help a villager in need, and you may find a loyal ally. Cross a powerful lord, and you may later face retribution. This creates a web of relationships where past encounters influence future outcomes, crafting a narrative that is uniquely responsive to your journey.

Immersive Realism

Our goal is to achieve an immersive realism where the player feels a part of a world that is alive and always in motion. The Advanced AI of ‘Medieval Life’ ensures that every corner of the world is filled with potential stories, encounters, and histories that feel as real and dynamic as the players influencing them.

In ‘Medieval Life’, the Advanced AI is not just a feature; it’s the heartbeat of the game, ensuring that every moment is lived in a world as unpredictable and vibrant as our own.

content_descriptors.notes:
'Medieval Life' offers a deeply immersive medieval experience that includes mature themes and content. Players should be aware that the game features:

Combat and Violence: Realistic depictions of medieval combat, which can be graphic and include melee combat, ranged warfare, and siege battles. Blood and injury details are present, reflecting the game's commitment to historical accuracy.

Sensitive Historical Topics: Storylines that may explore complex and sensitive subjects reflective of the Middle Ages, such as serfdom, feudal justice, and historical conflicts which could include scenes of public execution or punishment.

Sexual Content: While there are no explicit depictions of sexual acts, the game may include romantic storylines and references to sexual relations as part of character interactions and world-building, in accordance with historical context.

Alcohol and Substance Use: Portrayals of alcohol consumption and herbal medicine reflective of the time period, which may include scenes in taverns or apothecaries.

Mature Language: Dialogue that may contain period-appropriate mature language and expressions.

The game provides robust content control settings, allowing players to tailor their experience according to their comfort levels with these themes.

Please note that while the game takes inspiration from historical events and practices, it aims to handle all such content with sensitivity and respect. Player discretion is advised.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10.14
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent "Intel Only"
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M290X or equivalent
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance may vary depending on Mac model and system configuration.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11.0 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent "Intel Only"
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5500M or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended for faster loading times. Performance may vary significantly based on model year, SSD vs. HDD, and graphics capabilities.
